molecule

Class MInfoIO

  • java.lang.Object
    • molecule.MolUtil
      • molecule.MInfoIO

  • public class MInfoIO
extends MolUtil
    Provides the classes to read and write ".minfo" files.
    Since:
    Sindo 3.0
    Version:
    1.5
    Author:
    Kiyoshi Yagi

      Constructs the object of MInfoIO.

      Constructs the object of MInfoIO with a given Molecule

      Dump the data to the file with filename.

      Load the data of molecule from the file with filename.
      void printAtoms()
      Print the label, atomic number, mass, and xyz coordinates, and atomic charge if exists
      void printElecStruct()
      Print the information on the electronic structure (the energy, dipole, etc.)
      void printVibration()
      Print the information on the vibrational structure (the frequency, displacement vectors)

      Turns on the read/write of all data.

      Turns the read/write of Atomic data on/off.

      Sets the version of minfo file

      Turns the read/write of vibrational data on/off.
      void unsetAllData()
      Turns off the read/write of all data.

      • dumpMOL

        public void dumpMOL(java.lang.String filename)
             throws java.io.IOException
        Dump the data to the file with filename.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the data file.
        Throws:
        java.io.IOException - If the file cannot be opened.

      • loadMOL

        public Molecule loadMOL(java.lang.String filename)
                 throws java.io.FileNotFoundException,
                        java.io.IOException
        Load the data of molecule from the file with filename. This method overwrites the existing molecule.
        Parameters:
        filename - The name of the data file
        Returns:
        Molecule read from the file
        Throws:
        java.io.FileNotFoundException - Thrown when the file doesn't exists.
        java.io.IOException - Thrown if the file is empty.

      • setAtomData

        public void setAtomData(boolean atomData)
        Turns the read/write of Atomic data on/off.
        Parameters:
        atomData - the switch for the atom data

        Parameters:

        Parameters:
        vibData - the switch for the vibrational data

      • setAllData

        Turns on the read/write of all data.

      • unsetAllData

        Turns off the read/write of all data.

      • setVersion

        Sets the version of minfo file
        Parameters:
